original_text: Then they said, “Come, let us build ourselves a city, with a tower that reaches to the heavens, so that we may make a name for ourselves; otherwise we will be scattered over the face of the whole earth.”
korean_text: 또 말하되 자, 성읍과 탑을 건설하여 그 탑 꼭대기를 하늘에 닿게 하여 우리 이름을 내고 온 지면에 흩어짐을 면하자 하였더니

sentences.original_text: Come, let us build ourselves a city
with a tower that reaches to the heavens
so that we may make a name for ourselves
over the face of the whole earth
